dmca.title: Wisegeek complains of article copying
dmca.body:
The copyrighted work at issue is the textual content of my entire website located at: www.wisegeek.com

The website located at www.co-uk.info includes virtually all of the current content on my site with a few changes on a small number of pages. The infringer has changed the header, footer and some of the images, but the vast majority of the textual content is copied verbatim.
Search Query: we cover all those gadgets compendium
Infringing Web Pages:  www.co-uk.info/

Search Query: "very straightforward website" compendium
Infringing Web Pages: www.co-uk.info/pages/faq.htm
www.co-uk.info/pages/folder-internet/what-is-compendium.htm

Search Query: "general information regarding countries" compendium
Infringing Web Pages: www.co-uk.info/pages/links-we-like.htm
Search Query: "A Scoville unit is a unit"
Infringing Web Pages: www.co-uk.info/pages/folder-food/what-is-a-scoville-unit.htm 
(note: you must click "repeat the search with the omitted results included" to see the link)

Search Query: "Over 500 years ago Vlad"
Infringing Well Pages: www.co-uk.info/pages/folder-people/who-was-vlad-the-impaler.htm
(note: you must click "repeat the search with the omitted results included" to see the link)

There are over 1,500 articles on my site, I can provide many more infringing results if needed. The above examples are only a small sampling of the infringing content. Note that the infringing website (www.co-uk.info) is solely comprised of content stolen from my site.

I can be reached via email at: [private]@wisegeek.com or by phone at [private]

The administrator of the infringing site should be reachable at the following email address: [private]@radut.net

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am tlhe copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
